seo.title: Contact | Time 2 Trade
seo.description: Contact Time 2 Trade. Send a message for support, feedback, or questions. Prefer DM? Reach us on X.

page.heading: Get in touch
page.description: Send a message for support, feedback, or questions. Prefer DM? Reach us on X for the fastest response.

form.heading: Send a message
form.subheading: Support, feedback, or questions — we read every message.

country.label: Country / code
country.title: Select your country to set the calling code

message.label: Message
message.helperText: Tell us what you need help with.

form.submitError: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again or DM us on X.
form.disclaimer: We only use your info to respond. No marketing.

success.heading: Thanks — we got it
success.message: We'll follow up using the email you provided. In the meantime, you can jump into the calendar or head back home.
